channel.title: Generative Models on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Generative Models on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Categorical Flow Matching on Statistical Manifolds
item.description: Statistical Flow Matching (SFM) uses information geometry to create a new flow-matching framework for generating discrete data, achieving superior sampling quality and likelihood compared to existing …

item.title: Generative Fractional Diffusion Models
item.description: Generative Fractional Diffusion Models (GFDM) leverages fractional diffusion processes for superior image generation, enhancing diversity and quality while addressing existing diffusion model limitati…

item.title: Learning Distributions on Manifolds with Free-Form Flows
item.description: Manifold Free-Form Flows (M-FFF) achieves fast and accurate generative modeling on Riemannian manifolds using a single function evaluation, outperforming prior methods.

item.title: Piecewise deterministic generative models
item.description: Novel generative models based on piecewise deterministic Markov processes (PDMPs) are introduced, offering efficient training procedures and theoretical guarantees, surpassing diffusion-based models i…

item.title: TabEBM: A Tabular Data Augmentation Method with Distinct Class-Specific Energy-Based Models
item.description: TabEBM: Class-specific EBMs boost tabular data augmentation, improving classification accuracy, especially on small datasets, by generating high-quality synthetic data.
